SEARCH

Package Network.ServerSide

package Network.ServerSide
  • Class
    Description
    RemoteServerImplementation
    This Class contains the implementation of all the Remote Methods provided by RemoteServerInterface and also other methods used by the RemoteServer to access and give orders to the GameController
    RemoteServerInterface
    This Class is the RemoteServer Interface sent to the RemoteClients as a stub.
    RMIServer
    This Class represents the launcher of the method which realizes the binding and the registration of the RemoteServer onto the RMIRegistry
    ServerApp
    This Class is the launcher of the ServerSide part of MyShelfie application.
